description: A vulnerability was found in Benner ModernaNet up to 1.1.0. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /AGE0000700/GetImageMedico?fooId=1. The manipulation of the argument fooId leads to improper control of resource identifiers. The attack can be initiated remotely. Upgrading to version 1.1.1 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
